    class CFPropertyList::CFReal

    This class holds float values

    Public Instance Methods

    to_binary(bplist) click to toggle source

    convert to binary

    # File lib/cfpropertylist/rbCFTypes.rb, line 129
def to_binary(bplist)
  bplist.num_to_binary(self)
end
    to_plain(plist) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/cfpropertylist/rbCFTypes.rb, line 133
def to_plain(plist)
  @value.to_s
end
    to_xml(parser) click to toggle source

    convert to XML

    # File lib/cfpropertylist/rbCFTypes.rb, line 122
def to_xml(parser)
  n = parser.new_node('real')
  n = parser.append_node(n, parser.new_text(@value.to_s))
  n
end
